main event: A civilian reported an unidentified flying object sighting in Metropolis, Illinois on May 26, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed flying very low, approximately 50 yards above ground,The object emitted an intense bright light and was about 16-20 feet in diameter,The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes before the object departed at high speed,Similar sightings in the area have been reported since 1946,The report indicates the observer had credible experiences with previous sightings.
sighted object: unidentified flying object emitting bright light
witness description: The report mentions unidentified witnesses; one reliable observer is noted.
